TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件，以提供自定义值从用户指定的值转换为 cell 属性所指定的类型中的值。 Handle the event to provide custom value conversion from a user-specified value to a value in the type specified by the cell property. 处理事件时，可以自行转换值，也可以自定义默认转换。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，您可以使用单元格方法和所选的类型转换器来自行转换值。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，您可以让默认的类型转换器分析值，但是修改属性返回的对象的 、和属性，该属性是使用单元格知识产权.Alternately, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 当你自行转换值时，请将属性的初始格式化值替换为 cell 属性所指定的类型中的转换后的值。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示无需进行进一步分析，请将属性设置`true`为。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 当事件处理程序完成时，如果为`null`或不是正确的类型，或者属性为`false`， 则使用带有默认类型转换器的单元方法来分析。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 此方法的默认实现使用传入的单元格样式的、和属性分析值。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果该值不等于，则使用属性和传入的类型转换器分析该值。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自定义单元格值到格式化值的转换以便显示，请处理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用检查日期项的有效性。The following code example demonstrates using to check the validity of date entries. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于编辑的单元格的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style applied to the edited cell.

value.span: 一个 ，表示正在编辑的单元格的当前样式。

span.span: A that represents the current style of the cell being edited.

value.span: 默认值为单元格的 属性的值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the cell property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确定对单元格有效的格式设置。You can use this property to determine the formatting in effect for the cell. 设置此属性或更改此属性返回的对象的属性不起作用，除非是`false`在事件处理程序退出时。Setting this property or changing the properties of the object that this property returns has no effect unless the is `false` when the event handler exits. 在这种情况下， 将使用单元格样式的、和属性分析单元值。In this case, the , , and properties of the cell style are used to parse the cell value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `DataGridView1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#303)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#303)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已成功地对单元格的值进行分析。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a cell's value has been successfully parsed.

value.span: 如果已成功地对单元格的值进行了分析，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cell's value has been successfully parsed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性以指示是否已成功分析新的单元格值，无需 进行进一步的转换。A sets the property to indicate whether the new cell value was successfully parsed and no further conversion is necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将设置`true`为成功分析单元格的值的时间。The following code example sets to `true` when the cell's value is successfully parsed. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]
